page.title: 13Church Life in South Wootton
page.content: There is a Methodist chapel situated on the Main road into King's Lynn and St.Mary's Anglican church which serves the need of the Christian community in the Woottons,under the guidance of the Rector,2 lay readers,organist and church council. Holy Communion takes place at 8am and family worship at 10am,alternately with All Saints,North Wootton. The church supports Junior Church Explorers for 3-10yrs.,Pathfinders for the 10+ and the CYFA for the 14+.Prayer and bible study groups meet each month at a parishioners home.The church supports a mothers union. The building programme in the Woottons has necessitated a{church extension}of an entrance lobby and balcony,which was completed in May 1985 at a cost of Â£31,000.There are 195 members on the church electoral roll.
